Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp17
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection.socket

Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.Client
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.socket.SocketClient
public class SocketClient extends Client
SocketClient class used to receive and send messages from and to the server

      port - the server's port of the connection

      Throws:
